name: Quantity Modifier
author: Kaser

sections.description: Allow your customers to quickly add multiple products to their charts while browsing your online store.
sections.installation:
Thanks for checking out Quantity Modifier! Set up is super simple and only takes a few minutes:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/quantityModifier directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Quantity Modifier screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Thanks for checking out Quantity Modifier! Set up is super simple and only takes a few minutes:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/quantityModifier directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Quantity Modifier screen to configure the plugin

Can I customize the ammounts of the buttons

Soon! This will be added into a new version as soon as it is completed.

How many buttons can I have

Currently we add three buttons, 5, 25, and 50 quantities. Adding more buttons will be an option in future updates as soon as it’s completed.

How are you so awesome?

I just am!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • MVP version-
  • Adds buttons to product page to modify the .qty input field

short_description: Add simple buttons to your product page that allow customers to quickly increase the quantity they wish to add to their cart
description: Allow your customers to quickly add multiple products to their charts while browsing your online store.

upgrade_notice.1.0: MVP, baby! It's all up hill from here.
